attributes.action: Ensure that any Member of Parliament who wishes to "Cross the Floor" to join another political party should not be allowed to do so without an immediate by-election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is wrong that policitians are allowed to leave the party that they were elected for and join another party without fighting a by-election.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
